headline: GM invests millions in Ontario plant for next-gen trucks
summary: The investment comes despite tariffs on Canadian products shipping to the U.S., and what changes will come to the U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement.

headline: Ford Recalibrates EV Strategy While Tesla Pivots To AI: Would the Bet Pay Off?
summary: Ford is recalibrating its EV strategy and doubling down on affordable EVs at a time when Tesla is pivoting to AI. Would Ford's latest bet pay off amid the EV industry slowdown?

headline: GM invests in Ontario plant for next-gen trucks
summary: By Kalea Hall DETROIT, Feb 18 (Reuters) - General Motors will invest $63 million Canadian dollars in an Ontario plant to support production of its next-generation gas trucks, the automaker said

raw.headline: GM invests in Ontario plant for next-gen trucks
raw.summary: By Kalea Hall DETROIT, Feb 18 (Reuters) - General Motors will invest $63 million Canadian dollars in an Ontario plant to support production of its next-generation gas trucks, the automaker said

headline: GM Invests Additional $63 Million at Oshawa Assembly for Next-generation Truck Production
summary: GM Canada today announced a new C$63 million investment in Oshawa Assembly to upgrade stamping operations, supporting preparations to build the next generation of gas-powered full-size pickups and enhancing capability in the service parts business. This investment builds on the C$280 million announced in June 2023, bringing GM's total investment in Oshawa since 2020 to C$1.5 billion.

raw.headline: GM Invests Additional $63 Million at Oshawa Assembly for Next-generation Truck Production

headline: GM Stock Up 42% in 6 Months: Worth Holding Onto for More Gains?
summary: GM stock has surged 42% in six months as market share gains, rising software revenues and investor-friendly moves fuel optimism despite tariff headwinds.

headline: Ford refuses to shy away from EVs despite $19.5 billion cost
summary: Naysayers have been taking a victory lap for weeks as the Detroit Big 3 has detailed exactly how many tens of billions they've lost on electric vehicles. Despite the hurdles, however, on Tuesday, Feb. 17, Ford gave more details about its plan to revolutionize the U.S. EV industry. This is because, ...
